tachyon.worker.block

Class BlockMetadataManagerView

  • java.lang.Object
    • tachyon.worker.block.BlockMetadataManagerView

  • public class BlockMetadataManagerView
extends Object
    This class exposes a narrower view of BlockMetadataManager to Evictors and Allocators, filtering out un-evictable blocks and un-allocatable space internally, so that evictors and allocators can be developed with much simpler logic, without worrying about various constraints, e.g. pinned files, locked blocks, etc. TODO(cc): Filter un-allocatable space.

        public BlockMetadataManagerView(BlockMetadataManager manager,
                        Set<Long> pinnedInodes,
                        Set<Long> lockedBlocks)
        Constructor of BlockMatadataManagerView. Now we always creating a new view before freespace. TODO(qifan): Incrementally update the view.
        Parameters:
        manager - which the view should be constructed from
        pinnedInodes - a set of pinned inodes
        lockedBlocks - a set of locked blocks
